In its mouth, it pools a fragrant nectar-like fluid. The fluid is really an acid that dissolves anything.
Lures prey with the sweet aroma of honey. Swallowed whole, the prey is dissolved in a day, bones and all.
_____ has a long vine that extends from its head. This vine is waved and flicked about as if it were an animal to attract prey. When an unsuspecting prey draws near, this Pokémon swallows it whole.
Once ingested into this Pokémon’s body, even the hardest object will melt into nothing.
